org.libav

Class DefaultMediaWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libav.DefaultMediaWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPacketConsumer, IMediaWriter

    public class DefaultMediaWriter
extends Object
implements IMediaWriter
    Default implementation of the media writer interface.
    Author:
    Ondrej Perutka

      • DefaultMediaWriter

        public DefaultMediaWriter(String url,
                  String outputFormatName)
                   throws LibavException
        Create a new media writer.
        Parameters:
        url - a destination URL
        outputFormatName - a name of the output format (if it is null, the format is guessed from the given URL)
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while opening the output

                 IPacketWrapper packet)
                   throws LibavException

        Description copied from interface: IMediaWriter

        Parameters:
        fileName - a file name
        Throws:
        LibavException - if an error occurs while creating the SDP
